channel.title: Server name and Player count at top of screen!
channel.description: I've seen it on some screenshots with the server name and player count at the top of the screen and search isn't being nice today. Can anyone tell me how/link me to a tut? Would be very helpful kthx =3

item.title: Server name and Player count at top of screen!
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

add this

    public void writePlayers() {
    int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
    sendFrame126("Say something here", 6570);
    sendFrame126("Say something here", 6572);
    sendFrame126("   @red@Players On - " + players, 6664);
    setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673
  }

then add this

writePlayers();

under

public boolean process() {		// is being called regularily every 500ms

Read full topic

item.title: Server name and Player count at top of screen!
item.dc:creator: @Surfingpikachao Surfingpikachao
item.description:
@Surfingpikachao wrote:

Sorry I’m a bit newbie, if my code looked like this:

[code]public int kitstarter = 0;
public boolean process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms
if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullGuthanEquipped()) {
int chance = 0;
chance = misc.random(10);

		if(chance == 3) {
			playerLevel[3] += (hitDiff);
			sendMessage("You drain the enemies health!");
			stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
		}
	}
	if (healingTimer > 0) {
		healingTimer -= 1;
	}
	if (actionAmount < 0) {
		actionAmount = 0;
	}
	if (actionTimer > 0) {
		actionTimer -= 1;
	}
	if (actionAmount > 4) {
		sendMessage("Kicked for acting too fast!");
		misc.println("Client acts too fast - disconnecting it");
		disconnected = true;[/code]

whee would I put writePlayers()?

Read full topic

item.title: Server name and Player count at top of screen!
item.dc:creator: @IP1 IP
item.description:
@IP1 wrote:

[quote=“Xbox Modder, post:2, topic:90919”]Add this in your client.java…

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("Say something here", 6570); sendFrame126("Say something here", 6572); sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }[/quote]

Correct =)
